text: Muhammad Fuad Masum ( Muḥammad Fūād Ma‘ṣūm; Kurdish: , born 1 January 1938)Iraq President's biography was the seventh President of Iraq from 24 July 2014 through 2 October 2019. Masum is a veteran Iraqi Kurdish politician and was elected as President following the 2014 parliamentary election. Masum is the second non-Arab president of Iraq, replacing Jalal Talabani, also Kurdish, and is a friend of Talabani. ==References== Category:1938 births Category:Living people Category:Presidents of Iraq Category:Prime Ministers of Iraq Category:Al-Azhar University alumni
title: Fuad Masum
